review: This game is perhaps one of the best games i've ever played. On single player the game challenges the player and it's a lot of fun but multiplayer playing with a friend is twice as good. I definately recommend the game to all different types of players, It's 1st person, a shooter and a zombie survival. AWESOME IN A GAME
Ace of spades is a fun game when you have people to play, such as friends, classmates etcBUT... Ace of Spades at the moment has barely anyone on, especially in Australia
